div.div: Bluffs Schools are closed until further notice.

div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 12:35 pm CDT

div.div: Partly sunny, with a high near 64. North wind around 11 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
Areas of frost after 5am. Otherwise, partly cloudy, with a low around 37. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

A 30 percent chance of showers, mainly after 1pm. Areas of frost before 8am. Otherwise, mostly sunny, with a high near 63. Light west northwest wind becoming west southwest 8 to 13 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.

div.p: Let's do our part to limit exposure

p.b: Lunches will be delivered starting on Tuesday, March 17th by yellow school bus to students in the school district. Buses will run approximately 4 hours later than your normal morning pick up times - for example if your child normally gets picked up at 7:20 am, the lunch bus will arrive around 11:20 am. We ask that you look for the bus and be waiting at your pick up spot so we can deliver your meals. Meals will continue to be offered at the main gym doors between 11 am and 12 noon each day if you would like to pick them up. We are preparing meals for ALL students so please take advantage of the meal service - we do not want meals going to waste. If you have questions or need to make alternate arrangements please contact the office.

a.aria-label: Read more about Meal Delivery Update
